Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, my ad "1899833822295400449" has been rejected but what is written in the rejection note makes no sense: "Please do not use exaggerated or hyperbolic claims within your headline/description/video, as it appears to be clickbait. $19/month Please reword your headline/description/video and submit. Insurance will start at $29."
Because there are no claims like that

Hi Kasparas, I'm sorry to hear that your ad was rejected. The rejection note indicates that the issue is with exaggerated or hyperbolic claims in your headline, description, or video, which can be perceived as clickbait. To resolve this, you should reword your headline, description, or video to ensure it does not contain any exaggerated claims and then resubmit the ad. For more detailed guidance on how to fix the issues with your ad and avoid future rejections, you can refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you believe the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.

Hi Kasparas, I'm sorry to hear that your ad was rejected. The rejection note mentions that your ad appears to be clickbait due to exaggerated or hyperbolic claims. To resolve this, you should reword your headline, description, or video to remove any language that might be perceived as exaggerated or misleading. For more detailed guidance on how to fix the issues with your ad and avoid future rejections, please refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you believe the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.
how can I submit for another review?

To submit your ad for another review, you need to make the necessary revisions to address the issues mentioned in the rejection note. Once you've reworded your headline, description, or video to remove any exaggerated or hyperbolic claims, save your changes and resubmit the ad. If you believe the rejection was a misunderstanding and your ad complies with the policies, you can also submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com. For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
